entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
